Mac.Description: The 2021 MacBook Air will likely feature specs similar to the 2020 model. That includes 8GB of RAM, a 256 or 512 GB SSD, a Retina display with True Tone, Magic Keyboard, Touch ID, and two USB 4.0 ports.

Apple MacBook Air 2020 is a macOS laptop with a 13.30-inch display that has a resolution of 2560x1600 pixels. It is powered by a Core i3 processor and it comes with 8GB of RAM. The Apple MacBook Air 2020 packs 256GB of SSD storage. Graphics are powered by Integrated Graphics Processor.

Apple MacBook Air 2020 is a macOS laptop with a 13.30-inch display that has a resolution of 2560x1600 pixels. It is powered by a Core i3 processor and it comes with 8GB of RAM. The Apple MacBook Air 2020 packs 256GB of SSD storage. Graphics are powered by Integrated Graphics Processor.

The 11-inch iPad Pro continues to feature the same LED 'Liquid Retina Display' as the 2020 model. The 11-inch iPad Pro features a resolution of 2388 x 1668 with 264 pixels per inch. The display can deliver up to 600 nits brightness with just 1.8 percent reflectivity.

The Apple iPad Pro is a 12.9-inch touch screen tablet PC that is larger and offers higher resolution than Apple's other iPad models. The iPad Pro was scheduled to debut in November 2015, running the iOS 9 operating system.
The 2021 iPad Pro has been announced during Apple's 'Spring Loaded' event with a new display technology in the 12.9-inch model, camera improvements, better processor, and more.
The iPhone 12 Mini comes in 4 model numbers, which are A2176, A2398, A2399, and A2400. Apple released different model numbers for different markets and their cellular bands are different as well

The Apple iPhone SE (2020) is the update to Apple's cheapest smartphone. ... The iPhone SE 2020 retains the fingerprint reader on the home button, has stereo speakers, a battery with support for fast charging, is resistant to dust and water with IP67 certification and runs iOS 13.

The iPhone 11 succeeds the iPhone XR, and it features a 6.1-inch LCD display that Apple calls a 'Liquid Retina HD Display.' It features a 1792 x 828 resolution at 326ppi, a 1400:1 contrast ratio, 625 nits max brightness, True Tone support for adjusting the white balance to the ambient lighting, and wide color support

The available space is less and depends on many factors. A standard configuration - with iOS and apps pre-installed - requires approximately 11-14 GB of space, depending on the model and settings. Pre-installed apps take up about 4GB of space, but can be uninstalled and restored at any time. Capacity depends on software version and may vary by device.

The Apple iPhone XR is a smartphone that was tested with the iOS 12.0. 1 operating system. This model weighs 6.9 ounces, has a 6.1 inch display, 12-megapixel main camera, and 7-megapixel selfie camera. It comes with 3GB of RAM.

The 'AirPods 3' are anticipated to launch in 2021 with more features and a smaller design similar to the AirPods Pro. The new generation could improve battery life, add water resistance, and gain changeable ear-tips.

AirPods Max are Apple's high-end wire-free over-ear headphones, featuring Active Noise Cancellation, Transparency Mode, Adaptive EQ, and spatial audio, in a range of color options. Announced in December 2020, the AirPods Max are still a new product in Apple's lineup.

AirPods will forever change the way you use headphones. Whenever you pull your AirPods out of the charging case, they instantly turn on and connect to your iPhone, Apple Watch, iPad, or Mac. ... Driven by the custom Apple W1 chip, AirPods use optical sensors and a motion accelerometer to detect when they're in your ears.

The iPad mini is Apple's smallest tablet with a 2048 x 1536 7.9-inch Retina display. Compared to the prior iPad mini, the updated version has new display technology like True Tone for adjusting the white balance to match the ambient lighting of the room and wide color support for more vivid, true-to-life colors.
Apple's Mac mini is exactly that: a mini Mac. It's a small, portable desktop computer that can turn any screen into a Mac-powered smart computer. A computer that can be used for digital signage.

nike.Description: Let your youthful optimism shine through in the Nike Air Force 1 '07 Premium, the original basketball shoe that proves you're never too old for pineapples. To renew its legendary look, the Swoosh logo and heel feature a plant material. Textured that is made from pineapple leaf fiber, the coconut milk upper offers an easy-to-match style, and the cork outsole adds the sophistication of earth tones.

Inspired by the early AJ1s, the Air Jordan 1 Mid sneakers offer fans of retro Jordan the opportunity to follow in the footsteps of greatness. Innovative color brings the trim of classic, flawless materials to life and adds a touch of novelty to a familiar design.

Multiply the Swoosh and power up with the Nike Air Force 1. This original basketball model incorporates the same inspired performance benefits as the original 1982 shoes, while adding new design details. The leather upper features various Swoosh logos and bold color accents for a dynamic look.

Designed to fit your feet and offer added comfort, the Nike Air Huarache brings back an urban favorite. Soft leather touches on the upper combine with super-breathable neoprene fabric with a perfect shine for an easy style. A low-cut ankle area and bootie construction maintain elegance. The iconic heel clip and insulated logo deliver the early '90s look you love.

There is nothing as light, comfortable or authentic as the Nike Air Max 90 Premium, which stays true to its roots with the iconic waffle outsole, stitched overlays and classic TPU touches. New colors bring a fresh look and Max Air cushioning adds comfort with every step.

Zion is unlike anything or anyone thanks to his down-to-earth demeanor and near-alien capabilities. On the court, his gracious personality that puts family top priority transforms into an unstoppable strength of fitness and limitless speed. Zion 1 are the first of their exclusive line, and feature a design inspired by their duality between humility and superhuman ability. Full Air Strobel cushioning is combined with a Zoom Air unit in the forefoot to offer a sensational combination of soft comfort in the forefoot. Sole of the foot and quick reactivity.They are light, stable and resistant, with aggressive traction to help Zion dominate the court and control his power.

Take on the rough terrain of nature. The Nike ACG Air Nasu 2 increases durability with a ripstop upper and reinforced details to withstand the rigors of the trail. They feature mesh upper elements and an inner lining for breathability and breathability. On-the-go support.The grippy rubber outsole features studs designed to provide excellent traction on wet and rocky surfaces.

Take on the toughest and most extreme trail runs thanks to the rugged design of the Nike Wildhorse 7. The upper provides ventilation, durability and support where you need it most. Foam cushioning in the midsole offers responsiveness mile after mile.

The lighter the shoes, the greater the comfort. The Air Jordan XXXV, with an improved design from last year, features an Eclipse 2.0 stabilizer plate, visible cushioning and new Flightwire cables. They are light and reactive, and their design allows you to get the most out of your power and physical form.

The first ever Air Max for everyday wear gives you more style, comfort and a great attitude in the Nike Air Max 270. The design is inspired by the Air Max icons to highlight Nike's most important innovation with a wide window and a great variety of modern colors.

The Nike Air Max 90 By You, which were first a legend on the track and later on the streets, brings the comfort of the Air design to everyone. Now you can reinvent this classic with an up-to-date color palette, outsole options and a zone for a personal message.

Russell Westbrook backs up his daring attitude with a fast, aggressive style of play and results that rank him among the best in the league. His new Jordan One Take II embodies this provocative air and the speed of it. Colors, textures and design lines embody Russ' character both on and off the court.

When LeBron accelerates on the court, he uses tremendous force. The LeBron 18 is designed to maximize your abilities and reduce the stress on your body. Combined cushioning in the sole of the foot allows you to use force to propel yourself at full speed.This eclectic colourway blends the hues of some of the most famous colourways in history from The King's exclusive line.

In all its versions, the Air Jordan 1 Mid always offer innovation, but without forgetting where they come from. Inspired by artists' paint-stained rags, this special edition features a canvas and suede combination with splashes of color spread across the surface and a brushstroke-patterned Swoosh.

The latest and greatest innovations for streetwear style, the Nike SB Force 58 offers the durability of a cupsole design with the flexibility of a vulcanized shoe, made from wool and suede with a perforated finish. The whole look is infused with classic basketball DNA.

LeBron and the Tunes vs. the Evil Goons! The LeBron 8 x Space Jam: A New Legacy celebrates the premiere of the new basketball movie, integrating soft materials and LeBron logos to add a touch of innovative basketball style.

The Nike Air Max 90 Unlocked By You incorporates all the elements of the classics with a simple design experience that puts you in control of every carefully crafted detail. They combine performance and sophistication for a luxurious ride.

Anti-fashion visionary Mimi Plange follows her own rules and creates sleek, spacious, and completely unexpected designs that hit all the sticks of culture. The LeBron 18 Low x Mimi Plange 'Higher Learning' are her first varsity-inspired sneaker. and represent a powerful symbol of sport and college. The LeBron 18 Low colors feature mustard, burgundy, pink and crimson tones that are not mixed with a varsity-inspired striped trim on the sides. 'Just a Kid from Akron', the LeBron spirit lion motto and mascot are inspired by the importance of education and the power of sport to transform lives.

Paul George is a reliable player who brings fluidity and stability to every match. He takes his time, but is always well positioned to make an extra pass, cut through the zone or hit a jump shot. PG 5 combines agile Low-profile design preferred by Paul with flexible Nike Air Strobel cushioning. The full Air unit is sewn directly into the upper to put soft, springy cushioning just underfoot and make PG feel like it's running on top of the clouds.

These aren't your parents' typical hiking boots. The Nike ACG Mountain Fly Low is ready for anything, whether it's at home, in the city, in the desert, in a canyon, or in the mountains. They feature an outsole. sticky rubber for mountaineering-inspired traction. Soft React foam in the midsole provides comfort whether you're walking around your neighborhood or climbing a tree.
